about_the_game: You are an ordinary office security guard who came to work on a regular working day. While entering the elevator, an explosion occurred, causing the elevator to fall. You wake up in an unknown laboratory, you have almost no hearing and hear different sounds. You find out that all this was set up by one mad scientist. Your task is to solve all the puzzles, find all the clues and get out of there alive.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains elements of mild violence and frightening elements (ghosts, zombies).

short_description: Voloff is a first-person psychological horror game. You play as an office security guard who has an accident that leaves him nearly deaf and stranded in an unknown back room. Your task is to find out who set up this situation and try to get out of there alive.
